title: Older Adults Are Obsessed With These Five Tech Topics
description: Fitness wearables and password managers are among the hottest topics for people ages 50 and up.

title: Elon Musk Revives Old Banking Dream in Pursuing $250 Billion Twitter Valuation
description: Behind the billionaire’s gamble to turn Twitter into a company worth more than 10 times its current valuation is an idea he has hung on to for more than two decades: digital banking.

title: Lyft Staff Pressed Founders for Change as Uber Pulled Ahead
description: Ride-share company’s new CEO says his priorities are boosting employee morale and overhauling the customer and driver experience.

title: Artificial Intelligence Is Teaching Us New, Surprising Things About the Human Mind
description: Thought is ever-changing electrical patterns unconnected to individual neurons. Meta is working on a system to read your mind.
